title: Phase 2 Extraction Schema
description: Standardized JSON schema for Phase 2 financial data extraction. This schema MUST be followed by all extraction processes to ensure Phase 3 calculations work correctly.

issuer_name.description: Full legal name of the issuer

balance_sheet.description: Balance sheet data (FLAT structure - no nested objects)

mortgages_noncurrent.description: REQUIRED: Non-current mortgages and loans payable

mortgages_current.description: REQUIRED: Current portion of mortgages and loans

income_statement.description: Income statement data - MUST include top-level noi and interest_expense

noi.description: REQUIRED: Net Operating Income for the most recent period (e.g., Q2)

interest_expense.description: REQUIRED: Interest expense for the most recent period (absolute value, positive number)

revenue.description: REQUIRED: Total revenue for the most recent period

ffo_affo.description: FFO/AFFO metrics - MUST include top-level values for most recent period

ffo.description: REQUIRED: Funds From Operations (most recent period, e.g., Q2)

affo.description: REQUIRED: Adjusted Funds From Operations (most recent period)

ffo_per_unit.description: REQUIRED: FFO per unit (most recent period)

affo_per_unit.description: REQUIRED: AFFO per unit (most recent period)

distributions_per_unit.description: REQUIRED: Distributions per unit (most recent period)

total_gla_sf.description: Total gross leasable area in square feet

same_property_noi_growth_6m.description: 6-month same property NOI growth (decimal, e.g., 0.023 for 2.3%)

ffo_affo_components.description: Optional FFO/AFFO calculation components per REALPAC methodology. Include when issuer doesn't report FFO/AFFO or to enable validation.

net_income_ifrs.description: IFRS net income (starting point for FFO calculation)

unrealized_fv_changes.description: Adjustment A: Unrealized fair value changes in investment properties

depreciation_real_estate.description: Adjustment B: Depreciation of depreciable real estate assets

amortization_tenant_allowances.description: Adjustment C: Amortization of tenant allowances for fit-out

amortization_intangibles.description: Adjustment D: Amortization of tenant/customer relationship intangibles

gains_losses_property_sales.description: Adjustment E: Gains/losses from sales of investment properties

tax_on_disposals.description: Adjustment F: Tax on gains or losses on disposals of properties

impairment_losses_reversals.description: Adjustment H: Impairment losses or reversals on real estate

revaluation_gains_losses.description: Adjustment I: Revaluation gains/losses on owner-occupied properties

transaction_costs_business_comb.description: Adjustment J: Transaction costs from business combinations

foreign_exchange_gains_losses.description: Adjustment K: Foreign exchange gains/losses (non-net investment)

sale_foreign_operations.description: Adjustment L: Gain/loss on sale of foreign operations

fv_changes_hedges.description: Adjustment M: Fair value changes of economically effective hedges

goodwill_impairment.description: Adjustment N: Goodwill impairment or negative goodwill

puttable_instruments_effects.description: Adjustment O: Effects of puttable instruments classified as liabilities

discontinued_operations.description: Adjustment P: Results of discontinued operations

equity_accounted_adjustments.description: Adjustment Q: Adjustments for equity accounted entities

property_taxes_ifric21.description: Adjustment S: Property taxes accounted for under IFRIC 21

rou_asset_revenue_expense.description: Adjustment T: Operational revenue/expenses from Right of Use Assets

non_controlling_interests_ffo.description: Adjustment U: Non-controlling interests in respect of FFO adjustments

capex_sustaining.description: Adjustment V: Sustaining/maintenance capital expenditures (for AFFO)

capex_development.description: Development CAPEX (for disclosure, excluded from AFFO)

leasing_costs.description: Adjustment W: Leasing costs (internal + external, non-development)

non_controlling_interests_affo.description: Adjustment Z: Non-controlling interests in respect of AFFO adjustments

calculation_method.description: Method used: actual amounts, reserve estimates, or hybrid

reserve_methodology.description: If reserve used, describe calculation (e.g., '3-year rolling average')

missing_adjustments.description: List of adjustments that couldn't be extracted
